full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Please find attached the products with the name, price, short description, and description.

Let me know if you need any further information.

Kindest Regards,
Maria


Maria Zoumaras

General Manager



Dr Jack Zoumaras
PLASTIC SURGEON
Address Suite 2/2a Mona Rd, Darling Point NSW 2027
P: 02 9327 1700 <tel:02%209327%201700> <tel:02%209327%201700> | F: 02 93625460
Email: info@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au <mailto:info@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au> <mailto:info@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au>
Website: artisteplasticsurgery.com.au <http://artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/> <http://artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/>
<http://facebook.com/artisteplasticsurgery> <http://instagram.com/artisteplasticsurgery/> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/artiste-plastic-surgery> <http://plus.google.com/102724056897218572163>

This email message and any attachments contain confidential information. This email and any attachments are intended only for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient, any use, interference with, disclosure or copying of this material is unauthorised and prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by return email and delete the email and any attachments from your system.

WARNING: Computer viruses can be transmitted via email. The recipient should check this email and any attachments for the presence of viruses. The sender accepts no liability for any damage caused by any virus transmitted by this email.




On Fri, 29 Nov 2019 at 13:09, Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
Hi Maria,

Ok sure, we have been through the photos.

We updated 7 existing products on the site with the new photos as they are a higher resolution.

We added 10 new products to the site here: https://artisteplasticsurgery.wpperk.cloud/product-category/dr-babor/ <https://artisteplasticsurgery.wpperk.cloud/product-category/dr-babor/>

Each of these will need:

The title confirmed (we took a best guess)
Price
Short description (sits up under the name, 1 sentence max)
Description (sits below the image)

Let me know if you would like to provide these to us (spreadsheet, worddoc etc.) or if you want me to do a quick how to video for you so you can drop the details in. It will take approximately 5min per product for you to complete.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>
